  • Method Details

    • clone

      public Object clone()
      Replicate this object by returning an identical copy.
      It is called by the initializer and do not fill any particular field.
      Specified by:
      clone in interface peersim.core.Protocol
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      Object

    • _init

      protected void _init()
      This procedure is called only once and allow to inizialize the internal state of protocol. Every node shares the same configuration, so it is sufficient to call this routine once.

      protected void sendMessage(Message m, BigInteger destId, int myPid)

      destId - the Id of the destination node
      myPid - the sender Pid
